title.en: The keyboard sounds of "Haunted By Silhouettes - Selkie"

content.no:
Keyboardlydene fra bridge-delen i låta Selkie av Haunted By Silhouettes & Bjorn "Speed" Strid.
Instrumenter som er brukt: [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) kontrollert av [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/) med External Signal Processing (ESP), [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/), [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/), [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) innspilt på 4-spors kassett med Fostex X-28H og [Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/) med [Leslie 122](equipment/amplifiers/leslie-122/).
Instrumenter som er brukt ellers i låta: [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) og [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/).
content.en:
The keyboard sounds from the bridge part of the song Selkie by Haunted By Silhouettes & Bjorn "Speed" Strid.
Instruments used: [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) controlled by [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/) with External Signal Processing (ESP), [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/), [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/), [Mellotron M4000D with custom cabinet](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/), recorded to 4-track cassette tape with Fostex X-28H and [Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/) with [Leslie 122](equipment/amplifiers/leslie-122/).
Instruments used elsewhere in the track: [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) and [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/).

title.en: Wurlitzer 200A with contact mic

content.no:
Spiller inn [Wurlitzer 200A elektrisk piano](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/) med en kontaktmikrofon (piezo pickup) for å fremheve mekanisk støy fra tangentene og sustain-pedalen. Signalet fra kontaktmikrofonen er så mikset inn med direktesignalet.
Jeg la også på litt romklang fra [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/) og spilte det inn på kassett for litt ekstra farging.
Instrument: [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/).
Klang: [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
Båndopptaker: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
Recording the [Wurlitzer 200A electric piano](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/) with a contact mic (piezo pickup) to capture the mechanical noise from the keys and sustain pedal. The signal from the contact mic is then blended in with the direct signal.
I also added a bit of room reverb from the [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/) and recorded it to a cassette tape for some extra color and saturation.
Instrument: [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/).
Reverb: [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H.

title.no: Hammond C3 med PLASMA Pedal og LIGHT Pedal
title.en: Hammond C3 with PLASMA Pedal and LIGHT Pedal

content.no:
[Hammond C3 tonehjulsorgel](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/) med [PLASMA Pedal](equipment/effects/gamechanger-audio-plasma-pedal/) og [LIGHT Pedal fra Gamechanger Audio](equipment/effects/gamechanger-audio-light-pedal/)
De to første eksemplene er spilt inn med en DI-boks og de to siste eksemplene er spilt inn med en oppmikket [Leslie 122 forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/leslie-122/).
Det øvre hornet er mikket opp med et stereopar Shure SM57, mens den nedre rotoren er mikket opp med en Sennheiser e 602-II.

Instrument: [Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/).
Effekter: [Gamechanger Audio PLASMA Pedal](equipment/effects/gamechanger-audio-plasma-pedal/) and [Gamechanger Audio LIGHT Pedal](equipment/effects/gamechanger-audio-light-pedal/).
Forsterker: [Leslie 122](equipment/amplifiers/leslie-122/).
content.en:
[Hammond C3 tonewheel organ](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/) with [PLASMA Pedal](equipment/effects/gamechanger-audio-plasma-pedal/) and [LIGHT Pedal from Gamechanger Audio](equipment/effects/gamechanger-audio-light-pedal/).
The first two examples are recorded with a DI box and the second two examples are recorded with a mic'd up [Leslie 122 rotary speaker](equipment/amplifiers/leslie-122/).
The upper horn is mic'd up with a stereo pair of Shure SM57 and the lower rotor is mic'd up with a Sennheiser e 602-II.

Instrument: [Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/).
Effects: [Gamechanger Audio PLASMA Pedal](equipment/effects/gamechanger-audio-plasma-pedal/) and [Gamechanger Audio LIGHT Pedal](equipment/effects/gamechanger-audio-light-pedal/).

title.en: The Clavinet solo sound of "Kaasin - Hidden"

content.no:
De forskjellige sporene som tilsammen utgjør [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)-sololyden i låta Hidden av Kaasin.
Trommene spilles av Chris Brush.
[Clavinet'en](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) er spilt inn med en DI-boks én gang og så re-amp'et flere ganger for de forskjellige sporene. Den eneste effekten som er brukt ved innspilling av DI-signalet er en [Real McCoy Custom Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/) på den siste delen av soloen.
[Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)-sololyden består av 6 spor.
Spor 1 & 2 (Fuzz): DI-signalet er re-amp'et to ganger med forskjellig fuzz-pedaler. En [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) og en [Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/). Begge fuzz-pedalene er kjørt gjennom en [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) inn i en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/), mikket opp med en Shure SM57. De to fuzz-sporene er panorert litt(25%) til hver sin side.
Spor 3 (Punch): DI-signalet er kjørt gjennom en [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) inn i en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) mikket opp med en Shure SM57. Det innspilte sporet er så kraftig komprimert med en CLA-76 (1176 plugin) og en CLA-2A (LA-2A plugin). CLA-76-kompressoren har en ganske sein attack-tid for å fremheve transientene og gi mer "punch".
Spor 4, 5 & 6 (Rotary effect): DI-signalet er kjørt gjennom en [Electro-Harmonix English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) og en [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) inn i en [Solton Dopplertone forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/). Det øvre hornet er mikket opp med et stereopar Shure SM57 og panorert hardt til hver side, mens den nedre rotoren er mikket opp med en Sennheiser e 602-II.

Instrument: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/).
Effekter: [Real McCoy Custom Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/), [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Mojo Hand FX Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/), [Electro-Harmonix English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) og [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Forsterkere: [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) og [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/).
Plugins: Waves Audio CLA-76 og Waves Audio CLA-2A.
content.en:
The different tracks that make up the [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) solo sound on the song Hidden.
The drums are played and recorded by Chris Brush.
The [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) is recorded with a DI-box once and then re-amped multiple times for the different tracks. The only effects used on the DI signal is a [Real McCoy Custom Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/) on the last part of the solo.
The [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) solo sound consists of 6 tracks.
Track 1 & 2 (Fuzz): The DI-signal is re-amped two times with different fuzz pedals. A [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) and an [Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/). Both fuzz pedals is ran through a [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) into a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) mic'd up with a Shure SM57. The two fuzz tracks is panned slightly(25%) to each side.
Track 3 (Punch): The DI-signal is ran through a [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) into a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) mic'd up with a Shure SM57. The recorded track is then heavily compressed with CLA-76 (1176 plugin) and CLA-2A (LA-2A plugin). The CLA-76 has a pretty slow attack to accentuate the transients for more punch.
Track 4, 5 & 6 (Rotary effect): The DI-signal is ran through an [Electro-Harmonix English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) and a [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) into a [Solton Dopplertone rotary speaker](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/). The upper horn is mic'd up with a stereo pair of Shure SM57 panned hard to each side and the lower rotor is mic'd up with a Sennheiser e 602-II.

Instrument: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/).
Effects: [Real McCoy Custom Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/), [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Mojo Hand FX Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/), [Electro-Harmonix English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Amplifiers: [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) and [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/).
Plugins: Waves Audio CLA-76 and Waves Audio CLA-2A.

title.en: The keyboard sounds of "Kaasin - Wrong"

content.no:
Noen av de forskjellige keyboarddelene fra låta Wrong av Kaasin.
Trommene spilles av Chris Brush.
Lydene i videoen har blitt editert etter opptak.
F.eks. Den reverserte [båndekkoen](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og de doblede [Erebus](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) spora.
Signalkjede for orgel: [Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/), [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/), [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) og Shure SM57.
Signalkjede for synth på mellomspill, vers og refreng: [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Boss DM-2 Delay](equipment/effects/boss-dm-2-delay/), [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) og [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Signalkjede for piano: [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/), AKG C451E (Stereo par) og [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/).
Signalkjede for synth på bridge: [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/), [Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/), [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) og [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
content.en:
Some of the different keyboard parts from the song Wrong by Kaasin.
The drums are played and recorded by Chris Brush.
The sounds in the video has been edited and altered after recording.
E.g. The reversed [tape echoes](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and the double tracked [Erebus](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/).
Signal chain for organ: [Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/), [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/), [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/) and Shure SM57.
Signal chain for synthesizer on interlude, verse and chorus: [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Boss DM-2 Delay](equipment/effects/boss-dm-2-delay/), [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) and [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Signal chain for piano: [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/), AKG C451E (Stereo pair) and [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/).
Signal chain for synthesizer on bridge: [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/), [Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/), [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/), [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).

content.en:
An alternative and cumbersome way to create the ducking / pumping effect using alternating mic distance instead of side-chain compression.

title.en: Kaasin - We Are One

content.no:
"We Are One" er en låt hentet fra det norske rockebandet Kaasin's debut album "Fired Up" (utgitt: 19. November 2021)!
Kaasin har sluppet two singler "Runaway Train" og "Revelation" på Streampeak Music in 2020.
Kaasin gav ut sin tredje singel, "Hidden" på Pride & Joy Music i July 2021, som er den første singelen fra det kommende albumet "Fired Up".
Spilt inn hos Dehli Musikk, Bø i Telemark og Juke Joint Studio, Notodden.
Produsert av Benjamin Dehli, Halvor Halvorsen & Kaasin
Mixet/mastret av Leif Johansen
Video av Jon Sandersen
Plateselskap: Pride & Joy Music
Musikere: Jan Thore Grefstad (vokal), Ståle Kåsin (bass), Jo Henning Kåsin (gitar), Benjamin Dehli (tangenter), Chris Brush (trommer) og Per-Morten Bergseth (trommer i video)
content.en:
"We Are One" is a track taken from Norwegian Classic Rock act Kaasin's debut album "Fired Up" (released: November 19th, 2021)!
Kaasin released two singles "Runaway Train" and "Revelation" on Streampeak Music in 2020. 
Kaasin released a third single, "Hidden" on Pride & Joy Music in July 2021, i.e.the first single from the upcoming album, "Fired Up".
Recorded and engineered at Dehli Musikk, Bø in Telemark and Juke Joint Studio, Notodden.
Produced by Benjamin Dehli, Halvor Halvorsen & Kaasin
Mixed/mastered by Leif Johansen
Video by Jon Sandersen
Label: Pride & Joy Music
Musicians: Jan Thore Grefstad (vocals), Ståle Kåsin (bass), Jo Henning Kåsin (guitar), Benjamin Dehli (keyboards), Chris Brush (drums) and Per-Morten Bergseth (drums in video)
Kaasin - Melodic hardrock in the tradition of the great bands from the seventies and early eighties.

title.no: Sequential Circuits Pro-One gjennom en Korg MS-20
title.en: Running Sequential Circuits Pro-One through a Korg MS-20

content.no:
Kjører lyden fra en [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/) gjennom en [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) og styrer dens tonehøyde. Lyden fra synthene er uprosessert  bortsett fra litt klang fra en [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/) som er lagt på.
Instrumenter: [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/) og [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/).
Effekter: [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
content.en:
Running a [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/) through the [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) and controlling its pitch with the audio.
The audio from the synthesizers is unprocessed except a small amount of reverb is added from the [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
Instruments: [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/) and [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)
Effects: [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/)

title.no: Innspilling av keyboard på "Kaasin - Runaway Train"
title.en: Recording keyboards for "Kaasin - Runaway Train"

content.no:
Klipp fra innspillingen av tangentinstrumenter på låta Runaway Train av Kaasin.

title.no: Innspilling av Fuzz Clavinet på "KAASIN - Revelation"
title.en: Recording Fuzz Clavinet for "KAASIN - Revelation"

content.no:
Innspilling av [Hohner Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) med [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) og [Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) for låta Revelation av Kaasin.
Dette er fra tema-/mellomspilldelen og broen.
Det ble også brukt en [Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Electric Mistress](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-electric-mistress/) og en [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/) på [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)-sporet, men ikke i denne delen av låta.
Instrument: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)
Effekter: [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Forsterker: [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/)
content.en:
Recording the [Hohner Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) with [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) and [Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) for the song Revelation by Kaasin.
This is from the theme / interlude part and the bridge.
An [Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Electric Mistress](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-electric-mistress/) and a [Solton Dopplertone](equipment/amplifiers/solton-dopplertone/) were also used on the [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/), but not in this part of the song.
Instrument: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)
Effects: [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Amplifier: [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/)

title.en: Clavinet with Whammy pedal

content.no:
[Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) med en [DigiTech Whammy pedal](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/).
Det er også en fuzz pedal, litt slapback ekko og en fjærklang i effektkjeden.
Jeg spiller gjennom en [Vox AC15H1TV forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).

content.en:
[Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) with a [DigiTech Whammy pedal](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/).
I've also added a fuzz pedal, some slapback delay and a spring reverb in the effects chain.
I'm playing through a [Vox AC15H1TV amplifier](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Effects: [DigiTech Whammy (5th Gen)](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/), [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Boss DM-2 Delay](equipment/effects/boss-dm-2-delay/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)

[Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/) med [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) inn i en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Metallboksen med den store knotten demper det kraftige signalet fra orgelet før det treffer [Fuzz Face-pedalen](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/).
Effekter: Dehli Musikk Attenuator Box og [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/)

[Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/) with [Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/) into a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
The metal box with the big knob attenuates the hot signal from the organ before it hits [the Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/).
Effects: Dehli Musikk Attenuator Box and [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter Fuzz Face](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/)

title.en: Kaasin - Runaway Train

content.no:
Debutlåta fra det norske bandet Kaasin grunnlagt av gitarist Jo Henning Kåsin som har samarbeidet med Glenn Hughes, Joe Lynn Turner, Doogie White og flere. Grunnleggende medlem og låtskriver i Come Taste the Band.
Kaasin: Jan Thore Grefstad (vokal), Ståle Kåsin (bass), Jo Henning Kåsin (gitar) og Benjamin Dehli (tangenter).
Ytterligere musikere: Rick Hagan (trommer).
Runaway Train (Kåsin/Heldal)
Produsert av Halvor Halvorsen/Jo Henning Kåsin i Juke Joint Studio, Notodden, Norway
Mikset/mastret av Leif Johansen
Video av Jon Sandersen
Plateselskap: StreamPeak Music DA
content.en:
The debutsingle from the Norwegian band Kaasin founded by guitarist Jo Henning Kåsin, collaborator with Glenn Hughes, Joe Lynn Turner, Doogie White and more. Founding member and songwriter in Come Taste the Band.
Kaasin: Jan Thore Grefstad (vocals), Ståle Kåsin (bass), Jo Henning Kåsin (guitar) and Benjamin Dehli (keyboards).
Additional musicans: Rick Hagan (drums).
Runaway Train (Kåsin/Heldal)
Produced by Halvor Halvorsen/Jo Henning Kåsin at Juke Joint Studio, Notodden, Norway
Mixed/mastered by Leif Johansen
Video by Jon Sandersen
Label: StreamPeak Music DA

title.no: Korg Polysix og Fulltone Tube Tape Echo med utslitt bånd
title.en: Korg Polysix and Fulltone Tube Tape Echo with worn tape

content.no:
[Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) gjennom en [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) med godt slitt bånd. Det utslitte båndet som gav mye "wow og flutter" og forvrengning av lyden.
Jeg kjørte [Korg Polysix'en](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) gjennom [båndekkoet](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) to ganger og panorerte det hardt til venstre og høyre for å skape en stereoeffekt og mikset inn det tørre direkte signalet
content.en:
[Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) through a [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) with a heavily worn tape. The worn out tape adding a lot of wow and flutter, audio dropouts and distortion.
I ran the [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/) through the [tape echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) two times and panned it hard left and right to create a stereo effect and mixed in the dry direct signal.

title.no: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo med tangentinstrumenter and trommemaskin
title.en: Fulltone Tube Tape Echo with keyboards and drum machine

content.no:
Testing av [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) med [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) og [Arturia Drumbrute](equipment/instruments/arturia-drumbrute/).
For å lage en stereoeffekt, er alle instrumentene sendt gjennom [båndekkoen](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) to ganger og panorert hardt til høyre og venstre. Det er også lagt på litt fjærklang fra en [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. pedal](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/).
Instrumenter: [Korg MS-20 (MK 1)](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) og [Arturia Drumbrute](equipment/instruments/arturia-drumbrute/)
Effekter: [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Step sequencer: [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)
Opptaker: Fostex X-28H
content.en:
Testing the [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) with [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) and [Arturia Drumbrute](equipment/instruments/arturia-drumbrute/). The second VCO on the [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) is sequenced by a Korg SQ-1.
I ran all the instruments through the [tape echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) two times and panned it hard left and right to create a stereo effect. I also added some spring reverb from the [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Instruments: [Korg MS-20 (MK 1)](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Mellotron M4000D with custom cabinet](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) and [Arturia Drumbrute](equipment/instruments/arturia-drumbrute/)
Effects: [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
Step sequencer: [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)
Recording equipment: Fostex X-28H

title.no: Roland Dimension D SDD-320 med synther og elektriske pianoer
title.en: Roland Dimension D SDD-320 with synthesizers and electric pianos

content.no:
Tester ut [Roland Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/) med tangentinstrumenter.
Alle instrumentene er spilt inn direkte med en Whirlwind Direct2 DI-boks, det er ikke brukt noen effekter eller forsterkere bortsett fra [Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Jeg anbefaler å bruke hodetelefoner eller stereohøytalere for å best høre effekten.
Effekter: [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Instrumenter: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/), [Logan String Melody II](equipment/instruments/logan-string-melody-ii/), [Rhodes MK I Stage Piano](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/), [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/), [Yamaha DX7](equipment/instruments/yamaha-dx7/).
content.en:
Testing the [Roland Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/) with keyboard instruments.
All instruments are recorded directly with a Whirlwind Direct2 DI box, no other effects or amplifiers are used apart from the [Dimension D](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
I recommend using headphones or stereo speakers for best hearing the effect.
Effects: [Roland Dimension D SDD-320](equipment/effects/roland-dimension-d-sdd-320/).
Instruments: [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/), [Logan String Melody II](equipment/instruments/logan-string-melody-ii/), [Rhodes MK I Stage Piano](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/), [Wurlitzer 200A](equipment/instruments/wurlitzer-200a/), [Yamaha DX7](equipment/instruments/yamaha-dx7/).

title.en: Lo-fi Tape Piano (sample pack)

content.no:
Lo-fi Tape Piano fra Dehli Musikk inneholder lyder av en [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/) som er spilt inn med kassettopptaker og 3 forskjellige mikrofoner. Forsforsterkerene på kassettopptakeren overstyrer litt og gir ekstra overtoner and kassettbåndet gir kompresjon i tilegg til små endringer i tonehøyde ('wow' og 'flutter').
Om du vil ha lyden av et perfekt intonert og regulert piano, er nok ikke dette produktet det du er på jakt etter. Dette låter mer som en [Mellotron- / Chamberlin](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/)-versjon av en [Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/).
Lydpakken inneholder 328 .WAV-filer (637,8 MB) og 3 .EXS-filer (295 KB).
Mikrofoner: Televerket Elektrisk Bureau (Telefon mik), JTS CX-516 (Gooseneck mik) og AKG C451E (Stereo par)
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H
DAW: Logic Pro X
Samples info: Én sample pr. tangent (2 for AKG stereo par) pr. mikrofon (328 samples totalt), Bit depth: 24bit, Sample rate: 48kHz
 Lydeksemplene er laget med kun samples fra denne pakken. Det reverserte pianoet på starten av introen (første 14 sekundene) bruker samples som har blitt behandlet og reversert i ettertid.
content.en:
Lo-fi Tape Piano from Dehli Musikk includes the sound of a [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/) recorded with cassette tape recorder through 3 different microphones. The preamps of the tape recorder are slightly overdriven and the tape adds compression and harmonics as well as wow and flutter (pitch variation).
If you want the sound of a perfectly voiced and regulated grand piano, this may not be the samples for you. This is more like a [Mellotron / Chamberlin](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) version of [the Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/).
The sample pack includes 328 .WAV samples (637.8 MB)  and 3 .EXS files (295 KB).
Microphones: Televerket Elektrisk Bureau (Telephone mic), JTS CX-516 (Gooseneck mic inside) andAKG C451E (Stereo pair)
Tape recorder: Fostex X-28H
DAW: Logic Pro X
Samples info: Single sample per key (2 for AKG stereo pair) per microphone (328 samples in total), Bit depth: 24bit, Sample rate: 48kHz
All the sounds in the examples are made exclusively with samples from this package. The reversed piano in the beginning of the intro (first 14 seconds) uses samples that's reversed and altered in post-processing.

title.no: Korg MS-20 arpeggioer med Logic og Korg SQ-1
title.en: Korg MS-20 arpeggios with Logic and Korg SQ-1

content.no:
Notene kommer som MIDI signal fra Logic og gjort om til styrespenning med en [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/).
Effekter som er brukt: [Electro Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man (analog ekko)](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. (fjærklang)](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/).
content.en:
The arpeggios are MIDI notes in Logic and the [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) is used as a MIDI to CV converter.
Effects used on the [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/): [Electro Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man (analog delay)](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr. (spring reverb)](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/).

title.en: Korg MS-20 ESP with guitar

content.no:
[Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) styres av gitar med External Signal Processor (ESP) og kjøres gjennom en [Fender Twin Reverb forsterker](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/).
VCO1: 1 oktav under gitaren.
VCO2: 1 oktav + 3 halvtoner over gitaren.
Envelope Generator 1 kontrollerer tonehøyden og får den til å glidd opp til tonen når den trigges og glid ned når volumet fra gitaren er under trigger-terskelen.
content.en:
[Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) controlled by guitar with External Signal Processor (ESP) running through a [Fender Twin Reverb Amp](equipment/amplifiers/fender-twin-reverb/).
VCO1: 1 Octave below guitar.
VCO2: 1 Octave + 3 semi tones above guitar.
Envelope Generator 1 controlling the pitch, making it glide up to the note when triggered and glide down when the volume from guitar is below trigger threshold.

title.en: Fender Rhodes and Korg MS-20

content.no:
Jeg spilte inn en kort live-jam på kassett med [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) og [Fender Rhodes MKI](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/).
VCO 2 på [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) blir styrt av en [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) mens VCO 1 blir styrt av tangentene.
Begge instrumentene er plugget direkte inn i Fostex X-28H 4-spors båndopptaker.
I effektsløyfa til båndopptakeren er det en [Van-Amps Sole-Mate Jr. (fjærklang)](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/), [Diamond Memory Lane 2 (analog delay)](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) and a [Boss Chorus Ensemble](equipment/effects/boss-ce-1-chorus-ensemble/) (Brukt som mono til "stereo" konverterer).
content.en:
I recorded a short live jam to tape with [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) and [Fender Rhodes MKI](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/).
VCO 2 on the [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) is sequenced by the [Korg SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) while VCO 1 is triggered by the keyboard.
Both instruments are plugged directly to the Fostex X-28H 4-track tape recorder.
In the tape recorder's effects loop I added [Van-Amps Sole-Mate Jr. (spring reverb)](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/), [Diamond Memory Lane 2 (analog delay)](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) and a [Boss Chorus Ensemble](equipment/effects/boss-ce-1-chorus-ensemble/) (Used as mono to "stereo" converter).

title.en: Controlling delay pedal with guitar

content.no:
Kontrollerer ekkotiden til en [Diamond Memory Lane](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) med notene som blir spilt på gitaren. Jeg bruker en VCA til en [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) som en expression pedal. Frekvens til volt konvertereren blir brukt til å konvertere frekvensen fra gitarsignalet til styrespenningssignal for VCA'en.
Det viste seg ikke å være så veldig nyttig, men det var et morsomt eksperiment 🙂
content.en:
Controlling delay time of the [Diamond Memory Lane](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) with the the notes being played on the guitar. I'm using the VCA in the [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) as an expression pedal. The frequency to volt converter is used to convert the frequency from the guitar signal to a controll voltage signal for the VCA.
It didn't turn out to be very useful, but it was a fun experiment 🙂

title.en: Perpetual Pitch Shifting Delay

content.no:
Bruker en Fostex X-28H, [Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/) og en [Digitech Whammy](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/) for å lage en "uendelig" pitch-justert ekko.
Signalkjede for instrument, mikser og effektpedaler: Gitar ➡️ Fostex (Input 1) ➡️ Fostex(Send) & Fostex(Out) ➡️ [Digitech Whammy](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/) ➡️ [Memory Man](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/) ➡️ Fostex (Input 2) ➡️ Fostex(Send) & Fostex(Out).
Signalkjede fra mikser til lydkort (interface): Fostex(Out) ➡️ [Roland JC-120](equipment/amplifiers/roland-jc-120-jazz-chorus/) ➡️ Par med SM57 ➡️ Lydkort.
content.en:
Using the Fostex X-28H, [Electro-Harmonix Deluxe Memory Man](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/) and [Digitech Whammy](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/) to make an "endless" pitch shifted delay.
Signal chain for instrument, mixer and effects pedals:
Guitar ➡️ Fostex (Input 1) ➡️ Fostex(Send) & Fostex(Out) ➡️ [Digitech Whammy](equipment/effects/digitech-whammy-5th-gen/) ➡️ [Memory Man](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-deluxe-memory-man/) ➡️ Fostex (Input 2) ➡️ Fostex(Send) & Fostex(Out).
Signal chain from mixer to audio interface: Fostex(Out) ➡️ [Roland JC-120](equipment/amplifiers/roland-jc-120-jazz-chorus/) ➡️ Pair of SM57s ➡️ Audio Interface.

title.en: Clavinet D6 - Fuzz Pedal Comparison

content.no:
Instrument: [Hohner - Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/).
Effektpedaler: [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter - '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Fender - Blender (3-knob)](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/), [Hudson Electronics, UK - Broadcast](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/) og [Mojo Hand FX - Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/).
Forsterkerinnstillinger: Forsterkeren er stilt inn slik at den ikke vrenger og satt til pentode mode (15 watts). Signal er sendt gjennom "top boost"-preampen. Volum omtrent klokka 10, Treble omtrent klokka 1, Bass omtrent klokka 3 og Top cut omtrent klokka 8.
Pedalinnstillinger: Innstillingene for fuzz-pedalene er like i alle eksemplene. Fuzz-potmeterene er satt til maksimum og output er satt til omtrent 'unity gain'. Tone og colour potmeteret på [Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/) er satt til omtrent klokka 12. Selector-bryteren på [Fender Blender-pedalen](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/) er satt til den første fuzz-innstillingen.
Fuzz-pedalene tar imot og sender samme volum som hverandre men det interne signalet og forvrengningen i pedalene vil være forskjellige. Som man kan høre har [Fender Blender-pedalen](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/) en del mindre forvrengning enn de andre.
[Clavinet'en](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) er tatt opp med en Whirlwind Direct2 DI-boks og re-amp'et med en Radial X-Amp inn i en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Forsterkeren er mikket opp med en Shure SM57 og en Sennheiser e 602-II.
På intro-melodien er det brukt samme oppsett, men det er i tilegg brukt en [Diamond - Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) og en [VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/)
content.en:
Instrument: [Hohner - Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/).
Effects pedals: [Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter - '93 Fuzz Face (NKT-275)](equipment/effects/dallas-arbiter-fuzz-face/), [Fender - Blender (3-knob)](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/), [Hudson Electronics, UK - Broadcast](equipment/effects/hudson-electronics-uk-broadcast/) and [Mojo Hand FX - Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/).
Amplifier settings: The amplifier is set to very clean and pentode mode (15 watts). The signal is fed through the top boost preamp channel. Volume about 10 o'clock, Treble about 1 o'clock, Bass about 3 o'clock and Top cut about 8 o'clock.
Pedal settings: The settings for the fuzz pedals is the same in each example. The fuzz amount is set to maximum and output is set to approximately unity gain. The tone and colour pots for the [Iron Bell](equipment/effects/mojo-hand-fx-iron-bell/) are set to 12 o'clock. The selector switch on the [Fender Blender](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/) is set to the first fuzz setting.
The fuzz pedals receive and send the same amount of signal as each other but the gain may vary inside the fuzz circuit. As you may hear the [Fender Blender](equipment/effects/fender-blender-3-knob/) is a lot cleaner although the fuzz amount on each pedal is set to maximum.
[The Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) is recorder with Whirlwind Direct2 DI box and re-amped with Radial X-Amp into a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
The amplifier is miced up with a Shure SM57 and a Sennheiser e 602-II.
On the intro I used the same setup, but with a [Diamond - Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) and a [VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) in line.

title.en: Analog delay as "Whammy" pedal

content.no:
Utstyr: [Fender Stratocaster](equipment/instruments/fender-stratocaster/), [Diamond Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) og [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
[MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin VCA blir brukt som en expression-pedal for [Diamond Memory Lane](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) sin ekkotid. VCA'en er kontrollert av Envelope Generator 1 og envelope'n er trigget av knappen til venstre for tangentene.
content.en:
Equipment used: [Fender Stratocaster](equipment/instruments/fender-stratocaster/), [Diamond Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) and [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
[The MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s VCA is used as an expression pedal for the [Diamond Memory Lane](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/)'s delay time. The VCA is controlled by Envelope Generator 1 and the envelope is triggered by the push button.

thumbnailDescription: A Korg MS-20 and a red Fender Stratocaster electric guitar

title.en: Setup for semi sequenced Korg MS-20

content.no:
Med dette oppsette kan du spille VCO 1 mens VCO 2 blir styrt av [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/). [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sin klokkehastinghet/tempo blir kontrollert av [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin Modulation Generator.

Oppsett av [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) for [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/):
- Sett CV-A range til 8V (Hz/V):
- Sett polaritet for GATE OUT til negativ

Tilkobling av [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) til [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/):
- Koble [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sin CV-A OUT eller CV-B OUT ttil [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin VCO 2 CV IN
- Koble [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin Retangle-utgang fra Modulation Generator til [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sin SYNC IN

Valgfritt:
- Om du vil at [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) skal styre envelope'n instedenfor keyboardet, koble [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sin GATE-A OUT eller GATE-B OUT til [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin TRIG IN
content.en:
This setup makes you play the VCO 1 while the VCO 2 is sequenced by the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/). The [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)'s clock speed is controlled by [the MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s Modulation Generator.

Setting up the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) for [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/):
- Set the CV-A range to 8V (Hz/V):
- Set the polarity of GATE OUT to negative

Connecting the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) to [the MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/):
- Connect [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)'s CV-A OUT or CV-B OUT to [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s VCO 2 CV IN
- Connect [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s Rectangle output from Modulation Generator to [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)'s SYNC IN

Optional:
- If you want the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) to trigger the envelope instead of the keyboard connect [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/)'s GATE-A OUT or GATE-B OUT to [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s TRIG IN

title.no: Korg MS-20 og Korg SQ-1 kontrollerer hverandre
title.en: Korg MS-20 and Korg SQ-1 controlling each other

content.no: [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin modulation generator sender pulse bølger som synk-signal til [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) og [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sender gate-signal og styrespenning til [MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) sin VCO 2.
content.en: [The MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/)'s modulation generator sends pulse waves as sync signal to the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) and the [SQ-1](equipment/instruments/korg-sq-1/) sends gate signal and control voltage to VCO 2 on [the MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/).

title.en: Clavinet solo

content.no:
[Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)-solo på "Don't You Wanna Know?" med Set One's Cap live på Wrightegaarden i Langesund.
[Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) med [Real McCoy Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/) gjennom en [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Set One's Cap: Kasper Waag (Trommer), Sondre Gautefald (Bass og koring), Benjamin Dehli (Orgel, [Rhodes](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) og [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)), Martin Torgersen (Synth), Joakim Juul (Vokal) og Carl-Viktor Guttormsen (Gitar).
content.en:
[Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) solo on "Don't You Wanna Know?" with Set One's Cap live at Wrightegaarden in Langesund.
[Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/) with [Real McCoy Picture Wah](equipment/effects/real-mccoy-custom-picture-wah/) through a [Vox AC15H1TV](equipment/amplifiers/vox-ac15h1tv/).
Set One's Cap: Kasper Waag (Drums), Sondre Gautefald (Bass and backing vocals), Benjamin Dehli (Organ, [Rhodes](equipment/instruments/rhodes-mark-i-stage-piano/) and [Clavinet](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/)), Martin Torgersen (Synth), Joakim Juul (Vocals) and Carl-Viktor Guttormsen (Guitar).

title.en: Korg CX-3 (analog) with effects pedals

content.no:
Her er noen lyder man kan lage med [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/) og effektpedaler.
Videoen er laget for å demonstrere allsidigheten til instrumentet når man kombinerer det med effektpedaler.
Håper du liker det og legg gjerne igjen en kommentar.
Signalkjeden er: [Goodrich Volume Pedal](equipment/effects/goodrich-h-120-highboy/) → [EHX English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) → [Diamond Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) → [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) → [Neo Ventilator](equipment/effects/neo-instruments-ventilator/) → [HardWire RV-7](equipment/effects/hardwire-rv-7/).
content.en:
Here are sounds you can make with a [Korg CX-3](equipment/instruments/korg-cx-3/) and effects pedals.
This video only demonstrate the versatility of the instrument in conjunction with effects pedals, so don't worry about my sloppy playing.
Hope you like it, and feel free to leave a comment.
The signal chain is: [Goodrich Volume Pedal](equipment/effects/goodrich-h-120-highboy/) → [EHX English Muff'n](equipment/effects/electro-harmonix-english-muffn/) → [Diamond Memory Lane 2](equipment/effects/diamond-memory-lane-2/) → [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/) → [Neo Ventilator](equipment/effects/neo-instruments-ventilator/) → [HardWire RV-7](equipment/effects/hardwire-rv-7/).
